title: New: Broderick Batts – Pink Empty Promises
body:
Been addicted to this new track from Tampa’s **Broderick Batts** recently – reminds me of the best moments of Vic Mensa and Chance merged together.

Tight verses, an energetic chorus and so so much ambition – assuring Batts’ place as one of the finest up and coming rappers around. Check out P_ink Empty Promises_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
